sqlMap.statement: SELECT GLBL_CMPY_CD, JVM_NM, CUR_PLD_QUEUE_NUM, START_THRD_NUM, PLNG_INTVL_SCD, MAX_QUEUE_NUM, ONL_PROC_ACTV_FLG, EZUPTIME, EZUPTIMEZONE FROM ONL_PROC_CONFIG WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd# AND JVM_NM = #cMsg.jvmNm_S#
SELECT JVM_NM FROM ONL_PROC_CONFIG WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd# ORDER BY JVM_NM ASC
